paragraph: He walked to the beach in his flip flops.

paragraph: Her engineering skills were the best in the business.

paragraph: Hmm... I think my wife knows better said my father.

paragraph: My brothers favorite color is blue.

comment: ambiguous since most people have two pairs of grandparents, the assumption is that it is the ones who are coupled that this refers to, but that might not be the case
